Name: CABMechs
Description: Making use of the Community Asset Bundle, this folder some all the 3025-ish era variants for Vanilla in one place - includes Wolfhound, Urbie R50, Assassin, Marauder II, Charger, Champion, Longbow, Nightstar.  It then adds 'Mechs from the TRO 3028 such as Linesman, Jayhawker, Nightstar and Loader King variants.
Author: Grizzly_nyo, based on the work of Justin Kase and others
